title: Drawing, "Virgil Reading the Eulogy of Marcellus to Lucretia and Augustus, Palazzo Cavina, Faenza", 1816
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over black chalk on heavy rolled paper
inscribed: Inscribed in ink: Virgilio legge lelogia di Marcello, Faenza casa Cavina
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Virgil Reading the Eulogy of Marcellus to Lucretia and Augustus, Palazzo Cavina, Faenza", 1816.
1816. Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over black chalk on heavy rolled paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2008.
